title: Implement KinKong Autonomous Trading Engine
description: Develop and deploy the autonomous trading engine for AI tokens on Solana, with 4x daily portfolio rebalancing, smart token selection, and automated execution.
objective: Create a fully autonomous trading system that can independently analyze, select, and trade AI tokens while managing risk and optimizing returns.

features.title: Token Selection System
features.description: Implement AI-driven token selection algorithm focusing on top AI tokens by market cap, volume, and momentum

features.title: Portfolio Rebalancing
features.description: Create automated 4x daily portfolio rebalancing system with position sizing and risk management

features.title: Trade Execution
features.description: Develop secure automated trade execution system with DEX integration and slippage protection

features.title: Risk Management
features.description: Implement comprehensive risk management with position limits, stop-losses, and exposure controls

features.title: Performance Tracking
features.description: Create real-time performance monitoring system with profit calculation and distribution tracking
